00037     @Action
00038     public void showAboutBox() {
00039         if (aboutBox == null) {
00040             JFrame mainFrame = ScheatorApp.getApplication().getMainFrame();
00041             aboutBox = new ScheatorAboutBox(mainFrame);
00042             aboutBox.setLocationRelativeTo(mainFrame);
00043         }
00044         ScheatorApp.getApplication().show(aboutBox);
00045     }
